sentences.sentence: With the comparative free time, I started to dabble in development.
sentences.translation: 由于时间相对自由，所以我开始尝试开发。

sentences.sentence: Those that did dabble in subprime loans were able to withdraw quickly.
sentences.translation: 因而，他们涉及到的次级抵押贷款能够迅速地撤回。

sentences.sentence: Don’t dabble, set your sights on onegoal and achieve it with overwhelming force.
sentences.translation: 别什么都去浅尝一下，眼睛放在一个目标上，然后尽全力去达到目标！
